title: Ticking Clock Action Music Pack
description: A collection of 10 Ticking Clock Action Music tracks.
longDescription:
Did you know this pack is also included in our Ultimate Cinematic Music Bundle which include all of Epikton's tracks for better value?


 Set the timer on and let the tension rise with each ticking second. This track is created especially for the ticking clock theme. The song's tempo is specifically matched with a real-life timer, so it feels natural. Nothing more thrilling than a ticking clock.

 

Potential use cases; action games, gaming soundtrack, cinematic countdown trailers, background music for video games, time bomb scenes.

 

Ideal for passionate game developers, YouTubers, video editors, and gamers who need countdown trailer music.


You can listen to the preview tracks here:


  •  Epikton - Against the Clock 02:10
  •  Epikton - At The Edge Of Time 03:27
  •  Epikton - Bloodlust 01:45
  • Epikton - Death is Chasing 01:59
  • Epikton - Devastator 01:04
  • Epikton - Digital Revolution 02:08
  • Epikton - Supercharger 01:52
  • Epikton - The Bounty Hunter 02:16
  • Epikton - Time Bomb 00:37
  • Epikton - Timelock 01:37
